comments.author: rat03gopoh
comments.body: Quote from: 0satosti on May 28, 2023, 07:08:00 AMThe giveaway will end at 10k pregnant women elected for the selection and the number of the winning comment will be elaborated randomlyLol, is this a joke? Let's say to find just 10k likes (who are really pregnant women) it takes 9 months. Now you're looking for 10k giveaway winners by assuming likes must reach at least 1 million likes to be drawn), in the process some of them have given birth and they're no longer in the category?
